site_code.comment: Site code (eg. UK_CNT_NH3_1 for the first NH3 continuous sampling in UK)

depth1.comment: Depth of layer, Level 1. Unit: m

depth2.comment: Depth of layer, Level 2. Unit: m

ecosystem.comment: DATUMOJ: Mezuroj pri plantoj (folia surfaco, nitrogena enhavo, klorofilo, seka maso)

lai.comment: LAI. Once/Twice during period . Unit: m2 leaf area m-2 ground area
lai.unit: m2 leaf area m-2 ground area

lai_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of LAI (m2 leaf area m-2 ground area) Once/Twice during period

veg_n.comment: Vegetation N. Once/Twice during period. Unit: g N m-2 ground area

veg_n_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of Vegetation N (g N m-2 ground area) Once/Twice during period

chlorophyll.comment: Chlorophyll. Once/Twice during period. Unit: mg m-2 leaf area

chlorophyll_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of Chlorophyll (mg m-2 leaf area) Once/Twice during period

green_leaf_area.comment: Green leaf area. Once/Twice during period. Unit: mÂ² green leaves m-2 ground area
green_leaf_area.unit: mÂ² green leaves m-2 ground area

green_leaf_area_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of Green leaf area (mÂ² green leaves m-2 ground area) Once/Twice during period

green_leaf_n.comment: Green leaf N content. Once/Twice during period. Unit: g N m-2 green leaf area
green_leaf_n.unit: g N m-2 green leaf area

green_leaf_n_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of Green leaf N content. Once/Twice during period. Unit: g N m-2 green leaf area
green_leaf_n_sem.unit: g N m-2 green leaf area

drybiomass.comment: Dry biomass Once/Twice during period. Unit: g m-2 ground area

drybiomass_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of Dry biomass Once/Twice during period (g m-2 ground area)

soil_prop.comment: DATUMOJ: unufojaj mezuroj pri grundaj ecoj

bd.comment: Bulk density. Unit: g cm-3 dry soil

shc.comment: Saturated conductivity. Unit: m h-1 MPa-1

fc.comment: Field capacity. Unit: % water by volume

wp.comment: Wilting point. Unit: % water by volume

pf_p1.comment: pF (soil water retention) curves. Unit: m3 water m-3 soil

pf_p2.comment: pF (soil water retention) curves. Unit: m3 water m-3 soil

pf_p3.comment: pF (soil water retention) curves. Unit: m3 water m-3 soil

toc.comment: organic Carbon. Unit: g-C kg-1 dry soil

ton.comment: Total organic N. Unit: g-N kg-1 dry soil

tn.comment: Total N Unit: g-N kg-1 dry soil

soilno3_level_1.comment: monthly NO3- concentration. Unit: g-N kg-1 dry soil

soilno3_level_1_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of monthly NO3- concentration (g-N kg-1 dry soil)

soilno3_level_2.comment: monthly NO3- concentration. Unit: g-N kg-1 dry soil

soilno3_level_2_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of monthly NO3- concentration (g-N kg-1 dry soil)

soilnh4_level_1.comment: monthly NH4 concentration. Unit: g-N kg-1 dry soil

soilnh4_level_1_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of monthly NH4 concentration (g-N kg-1 dry soil)

soilnh4_level_2.comment: monthly NH4 concentration. Unit: g-N kg-1 dry soil

soilnh4_level_2_sem.comment: Standard error of the mean of monthly NH4 concentration (g-N kg-1 dry soil)
